titles.title: He Who Began A Good Work

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He Who Began A Good Work In You
He Who Began A Good Work In You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He'll Be Faithful To Complete It
He'll Be Faithful To Complete It

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He Who Started the Work
Will Be Faithful To Complete It In You.
